title.rendered: “IDF Eliminates Hezbollah Air Unit Commander in Southern Lebanon: A Closer Look at Ali Hussein Berji’s Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF has eliminated the commander of the southern Lebanon region in the Hezbollah air unit

Today (Tuesday), the IDF, using an aircraft from the air force, eliminated Ali Hussein Berji, the commander of the southern Lebanon region in Hezbollah’s air unit. Ali led dozens of operations through missile bombing and gathering against Israel and IDF forces, including the attack on the Northern Command headquarters earlier today.

Before his elimination, a missile launch squad from the air unit in Hezbollah, which was on its way to launch bombing missiles towards targets in Israel, was also terminated.

Attached is a documentation on the topic: https://bit.ly/48NOEpw.
